item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: wp-user-f1koh5
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://demo.godam.io.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: wp-user-f1koh5
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: rtcamp
item.content:encoded:
Experience GoDAM in Action

Welcome to the official GoDAM demo experience — a curated showcase of what’s possible when advanced video capabilities are seamlessly integrated into WordPress.

From interactive video hotspots, embedded forms, and clickable CTAs to ad integration — each demo here represents a real-world use case powered by GoDAM’s flexible and performance-driven plugin architecture.

Login to Demo

Forms Inside Video

Watch how lead capture meets video. This demo integrates Gravity Forms and WPForms directly inside the video frame, letting users submit feedback or join a rewards program without ever leaving the video.

Overlay appears shortly, keep watching!

View forms demo

CTAs That Convert. Text, Image, HTML

See how you can embed interactive calls-to-action inside any video. This demo showcases image-based CTAs, clickable text buttons, and fully custom HTML overlays, all working seamlessly over playback.

Overlay appears shortly, keep watching!

View demo

Interactive Hotspots in Action

Explore an immersive car POV video where key features are highlighted using interactive hotspots. Clickable icons reveal details about headlights, autonomous features, and more, showcasing how layered video interaction can bring real-world context to life.

Overlay appears shortly, keep watching!

View demo

Ad Integration, Media Upload & VAST Server

This demo highlights two types of video monetization: a pre-roll ad uploaded by the user, and a mid-roll pulled from a VAST ad server. See how GoDAM makes ad delivery seamless inside any video.

Disable the ad blocker if ads are not appearing.

View demo

Adaptive Bitrate Transcoding in Action

See how GoDAM automatically converts a high-quality video into multiple resolutions. This demo showcases bitrate-based renditions like 1080p, 720p, 480p, and 360p, optimized for smooth playback on any device or connection.

View demo

Video Analytics Walkthrough

Watch how our dashboard visualizes viewer engagement in real time. This demo highlights key metrics like play rate, watch time, drop-off points, and top-performing videos, helping you make smarter content decisions.

View demo

GoDAM Blocks

Discover how our custom GoDAM blocks enhance your WordPress experience. This demo showcases the GoDAM Video, Audio, and Video Gallery blocks, designed to help you present content beautifully and interactively.

View demo

item.title: Gravity Forms
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Gravity Forms

Check how to easily add Gravity Forms as an interactive layer on any video at your chosen timestamp. Learn how to enable the GoDAM Recorder field to collect video or audio responses directly from viewers.

Login to Backend

Experience the Gravity Form Layer in Action

Watch the configured form seamlessly appear at the exact timestamp within the video, exactly as set up in the tutorial above. Engage viewers instantly and capture responses without interrupting their watching experience.

Note: The overlay layer will appear after a short while, so keep watching to experience it.

How to Add GoDAM Recorder to Gravity Forms

Learn how to integrate the GoDAM Recorder into your Gravity Forms and allow users to record videos, capture screens, or upload files directly through the form. Follow this step-by-step tutorial to see how easily you can enable seamless video submissions.

View Form

Key Features

Layer-based form integration

Seamless In-Video Form Capture

Works with your existing forms

SEE ALL FEATURES

item.title: WP Forms
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
WP Forms

Discover how GoDAM turns videos into interactive lead-capturing tools with WPForms. Watch the tutorial, see the result in action, and learn how easily the GoDAM recorder integrates with WPForms.

Login to Backend

See the WPForms Layer in Action

Checkout the final result video featuring a built-in WPForms Layer that appears at the perfect moment. See how GoDAM transforms videos into interactive experiences and enhances viewer engagement with ease.

At the chosen timestamp, the form appears seamlessly, letting viewers submit their email without leaving the video.

Note: The overlay layer will appear after a short while, so keep watching to experience it.

How to Add GoDAM Recorder to WP Forms

Learn how to integrate the GoDAM Recorder with your WPForms and enable users to record videos, capture screens, or upload files directly within the form. Follow this quick tutorial to set up seamless video submissions in just a few steps.

View Form

Key Features

Layer-based form integration

Seamless In-Video Form Capture

Works with your existing forms

SEE ALL FEATURES

item.title: Everest Forms
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Everest Forms

See how Everest Forms can be overlaid on videos to collect responses and drive engagement. Learn to configure it step by step, then preview the final video with the embedded form layer.

Login to Backend

Experience the Everest Form Layer in Action

Watch the configured form seamlessly appear at the exact timestamp within the video, exactly as set up in the tutorial above. Engage viewers instantly and capture responses without interrupting their watching experience.

item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Fluent Forms

Quickly embed Forminator Forms as interactive overlays within your videos. Watch the tutorial to set up the layer, then experience the final video with the form integrated at chosen moment.

Login to Backend

See the Fluent Form Layer in Action

Checkout the final result video featuring a built-in Fluent Form Layer that appears at the perfect moment. See how GoDAM transforms videos into interactive experiences and enhances viewer engagement with ease.

At the chosen timestamp, the form appears seamlessly, letting viewers submit their email without leaving the video.

Note: The overlay layer will appear after a short while, so keep watching to experience it.

How to Add GoDAM Recorder to Fluent Forms

Learn how to integrate the GoDAM Recorder into your Fluent Forms and allow users to record videos, capture screens, or upload files directly through the form. Follow this step-by-step tutorial to see how easily you can enable seamless video submissions.

item.title: Elementor Demo
item.dc:creator: rtcamp
item.content:encoded:
Build Pages with GoDAM & Elementor

With GoDAM’s native Elementor widgets, adding rich media is as simple as drag and drop. Whether it’s GoDAM videos, GoDAM audio, or responsive GoDAM galleries, you can build immersive media layouts right inside Elementor’s visual builder, without touching a single line of code.

Login To Backend

List Of Widgets

GoDAM Video

Allows you to seamlessly embed and configure your GoDAM videos directly within the Elementor page builder.

GoDAM Gallery

Create stunning, dynamic video galleries directly within the Elementor page builder. Enable infinite load or scroll for mobile devices.

GoDAM Audio

Seamlessly embed, stream, and configure GoDAM audio files directly within the Elementor page builder.

GoDAM Video Widget

Instantly embed and customize any video from your GoDAM library. Control playback options and apply styling directly within the Elementor editor

GoDAM Gallery Widget

Create beautiful, responsive video and image galleries. Organize your media assets into folders and use the gallery widget to showcase them in a clean, professional layout.

GoDAM Audio Widget

Embed audio files. Ideal for podcasts, music, or any audio content you want to share with your audience.

Build Pages with GoDAM & Elementor

With GoDAM’s native Elementor widgets, adding rich media is as simple as drag and drop. Whether it’s GoDAM videos, GoDAM audio, or responsive GoDAM galleries, you can build immersive media layouts right inside Elementor’s visual builder, without touching a single line of code.

Login To Backend

List Of Widgets

GoDAM Video

Allows you to seamlessly embed and configure your GoDAM videos directly within the Elementor page builder.

GoDAM Gallery

Create stunning, dynamic video galleries directly within the Elementor page builder. Enable infinite load or scroll for mobile devices.

GoDAM Audio

Seamlessly embed, stream, and configure GoDAM audio files directly within the Elementor page builder.

GoDAM Video Widget

Instantly embed and customize any video from your GoDAM library. Control playback options and apply styling directly within the Elementor editor

Create beautiful, responsive video and image galleries. Organize your media assets into folders and use the gallery widget to showcase them in a clean, professional layout.

Hotspot Layer

Experience interactive hotspots that appear at specific timestamps within videos. Learn how single or multiple hotspots enhance viewer interaction on a single frame.

Login to Backend

Single Hotspot

Tap to Explore the Product

This hotspot is linked directly to the product featured in the video. Click to learn more, view specs, or purchase. Right from the frame you're watching.

Overlay appears shortly, keep watching!

Multiple hotspots

Choose Your Favorite Color

Each hotspot points to a different product variant. Tap any cup to explore details for that specific color or design. You can enable an optional pause-on-hover feature for deeper interaction.

Overlay appears shortly, keep watching!

item.title: Ad Integrations
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Ad Integrations

Showcasing ad integration using both ad servers and custom uploads. Control ad placements at user-defined timestamps to maximize monetization opportunities.

Login to Backend

Highlight powerful video revenue monetization with flexible ad formats, including both server-side ad insertion via external ad tag URLs, and fully customizable manual ad placements directly within your video timeline. Monetize your media, your way.

To experience the full demo, please pause your ad blocker.

Ad Server Integration

Seamlessly connect to any ad server using industry-standard VAST ad tag URLs. This method allows you to deliver dynamic, targeted ads before, during, or after video playback. Managed entirely through your existing ad network.

Custom In-Video Ad Placements

Manually place your video ads directly inside your content timeline. Perfect for product placements, promos, or sponsorship clips. All controlled with precision over timing and duration, no third-party ad server required.

item.title: Adaptive Bitrate Transcoding
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Adaptive Bitrate Transcoding

Demonstrates adaptive bitrate streaming for smoother playback. Videos automatically adjust quality based on the viewer’s network speed and device.

Login to Backend

This demo illustrates how GoDAM automatically transcodes a high-quality source video into multiple bitrate versions. These renditions are ideal for adaptive streaming, ensuring smooth playback across all network conditions and devices.

Seamless Adaptive Streaming

Switch between multiple video resolutions effortlessly. The player automatically adapts to your network speed for the smoothest viewing experience.

Look for the Quality button in the player.

Why Multi-Bitrate?

  • Adaptive Streaming Ready: Switches resolution based on user’s bandwidth.
  • Mobile Friendly: Plays well on 3G or low-end devices.
  • CDN Optimized: Reduces buffering and abandonment.

Try changing the quality of following videos

item.title: Video Analytics
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Video Analytics

Visualize real-time video performance and viewer engagement metrics. Track play rate, watch time, drop-offs, and top-performing videos for better content decisions.

Login to Backend

Smart Insights. Smarter Videos.

GoDAM helps you track video performance in real time. Our dashboard uncovers:

  • Which videos keep viewers hooked
  • Where people stop watching
  • How each video performs across regions

Use these insights to refine your strategy, create better content, and deliver results.

Other analytics features

See full analytics breakdown and features

Full Analytics Features

item.title: Introducing GoDAM
item.dc:creator: wp-user-f1koh5
item.content:encoded:
GoDAM is a WordPress plugin for media management with built-in transcoding, interactive layers, and powerful analytics.

Key Features

  • Video Hotspot – Add clickable, interactive areas inside videos
  • Video Overlay – Layer text, images, CTAs, and forms over video
  • Advanced Media Management in WordPress – Organize assets with folders, filters, and search
  • Adaptive Bitrate – Smooth streaming across all network conditions
  • ADs Integration – Monetize using self-hosted or VAST ad formats
  • Video Analytics – Track plays, engagement, and viewer behavior in real time

item.title: WP Polls
item.dc:creator: rtcamp
item.content:encoded:
WP Polls

Boost viewer engagement by embedding interactive polls directly into your videos playback. Whether you’re collecting feedback, running a quick quiz, or driving audience participation, GoDAM’s video polls is powered by WP-Polls which make it seamless and intuitive to use.

Login to Backend

Experience the Polls Layer in Action

Watch the configured poll seamlessly appear at the exact timestamp within the video, exactly as set up in the tutorial above. Engage viewers instantly and capture responses without interrupting their watching experience.

Note: The overlay layer will appear after a short while, so keep watching to experience it.

Key Features

Layer-based polls integration

Seamless In-Video Polls Capture

Works with your existing polls

SEE ALL FEATURES

item.title: Transcoding Demo – Multi-Bitrate Output with GoDAM
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Transcoding Demo – Multi-Bitrate Output with GoDAM

This demo illustrates how GoDAM automatically transcodes a high-quality source video into multiple bitrate versions. These renditions are ideal for adaptive streaming, ensuring smooth playback across all network conditions and devices.

  • Look for the Quality button in the player.

Demo 1 – Nature

Demo 2 - Firework

Why Multi-Bitrate?

  • Adaptive Streaming Ready: Switches resolution based on user’s bandwidth.
  • Mobile Friendly: Plays well on 3G or low-end devices.
  • CDN Optimized: Reduces buffering and abandonment.

item.title: Video Analytics in Action
item.dc:creator: vipul
item.content:encoded:
Video Analytics in Action

Smart Insights. Smarter Videos.

Get a look at how GoDAM helps you track video performance in real time. Watch how our dashboard uncovers:

  • Which videos keep viewers hooked
  • Where people stop watching
  • How each video performs across regions

Use these insights to refine your strategy, create better content, and deliver results.

Other analytics features

See full analytics breakdown and features

Full Analytics Features
